rule_sets.heading: Chapter 1
rule_sets.subdivision: Live animals

rules.rule: All the animals of [chapter 1](/chapters/01) shall be wholly obtained

rule_sets.heading: Chapter 2
rule_sets.subdivision: Meat and edible meat offal

rules.rule: Manufacture in which all the materials of [chapter 1](/chapters/01) and [chapter 2](/chapters/02)  used are wholly obtained

rule_sets.heading: Chapter 3
rule_sets.subdivision: Fish and crustaceans, molluscs and other aquatic invertebrates

rules.rule: Manufacture in which all the materials of [chapter 3](/chapters/03) used are wholly obtained

rule_sets.heading: ex Chapter 4
rule_sets.subdivision: Dairy produce; birds’ eggs; natural honey; edible products of animal origin, not elsewhere specified or included

rules.rule: Manufacture in which all the materials of [chapter 4](/chapters/04) used are wholly obtained

rule_sets.subdivision: Buttermilk, curdled milk and cream, yoghurt, kephir and other fermented or acidified milk and cream, whether or not concentrated or containing added sugar or other sweetening matter or flavoured or containing added fruit, nuts or cocoa

rules.rule:
Manufacture in which: 

- all the materials of [chapter 4](/chapters/04) used are wholly obtained, 

- all the fruit juice (except that of pineapple, lime or grapefruit) of [heading 2009](/headings/2009) used is originating, *and* 

- the value of all the materials of [chapter 17](/chapters/17) used does not exceed **30%** of the ex-works price of the product

rule_sets.subdivision: Buttermilk, curdled milk and cream, yoghurt, kephir and other fermented or acidified milk and cream, whether or not concentrated or containing added sugar or other sweetening matter or flavoured or containing added fruit, nuts or cocoa

rules.rule:
Manufacture in which: 

- all the materials of [chapter 4](/chapters/04) used are wholly obtained, 

- all the fruit juice (except that of pineapple, lime or grapefruit) of [heading 2009](/headings/2009) used is originating, *and* 

- the value of all the materials of [chapter 17](/chapters/17) used does not exceed **30%** of the ex-works price of the product

rule_sets.heading: ex Chapter 5
rule_sets.subdivision: Products of animal origin, not elsewhere specified or included

rules.rule: Manufacture in which all the materials of [chapter 5](/chapters/05) used are wholly obtained

rule_sets.heading: ex 0502
rule_sets.subdivision: Prepared pigs’, hogs’ or boars’ bristles and hair

rules.rule: Cleaning, disinfecting, sorting and straightening of bristles and hair

rule_sets.heading: Chapter 6
rule_sets.subdivision: Live trees and other plants; bulbs, roots and the like; cut flowers and ornamental foliage

rules.rule:
Manufacture in which: 

- all the materials of [chapter 6](/chapters/06) used are wholly obtained, *and* 

- the value of all the materials used does not exceed **50%** of the ex-works price of the product

rule_sets.heading: Chapter 7
rule_sets.subdivision: Edible vegetables and certain roots and tubers

rules.rule: Manufacture in which all the materials of [chapter 7](/chapters/07) used are wholly obtained

rule_sets.heading: Chapter 8
rule_sets.subdivision: Edible fruit and nuts; peel of citrus fruits or melons

rules.rule:
Manufacture in which: 

- all the fruit and nuts used are wholly obtained, *and* 

- the value of all the materials of [chapter 17](/chapters/17) used does not exceed **30%** of the value of the ex-works price of the product

rule_sets.subdivision: Coffee, whether or not roasted or decaffeinated; coffee husks and skins; coffee substitutes containing coffee in any proportion

rules.rule: Manufacture from materials of any heading

rule_sets.subdivision: Tea, whether or not flavoured

rules.rule: Manufacture from materials of any heading

rule_sets.heading: ex Chapter 9
rule_sets.subdivision: Coffee, tea, maté and spices

rules.rule: Manufacture in which all the materials of [chapter 9](/chapters/09) used are wholly obtained

rule_sets.heading: ex 0910
rule_sets.subdivision: Mixtures of spices

rules.rule: Manufacture from materials of any heading

rule_sets.heading: Chapter 10
rule_sets.subdivision: Cereals

rules.rule: Manufacture in which all the materials of [chapter 10](/chapters/10) used are wholly obtained

rule_sets.heading: ex Chapter 11
rule_sets.subdivision: Products of the milling industry; malt; starches; inulin; wheat gluten

rules.rule: Manufacture in which all the cereals, edible vegetables, roots and tubers of [heading 0714](/headings/0714) or fruit used are wholly obtained

rule_sets.heading: ex 1106
rule_sets.subdivision: Flour, meal and powder of the dried, shelled leguminous vegetables of heading 0713

rules.rule: Drying and milling of leguminous vegetables of [heading 0708](/headings/0708)

rule_sets.heading: Chapter 12
rule_sets.subdivision: Oil seeds and oleaginous fruits; miscellaneous grains, seeds and fruit; industrial or medicinal plants; straw and fodder

rules.rule: Manufacture in which all the materials of [chapter 12](/chapters/12) used are wholly obtained

rule_sets.subdivision: Lac; natural gums, resins, gum-resins and oleoresins (for example, balsams)

rules.rule: Manufacture in which the value of all the materials of [heading 1301](/headings/1301) used does not exceed **50%** of the ex-works price of the product

rule_sets.subdivision: – Mucilages and thickeners, modified, derived from vegetable products

rules.rule: Manufacture from non-modified mucilages and thickeners

rule_sets.subdivision: – Other

rules.rule: Manufacture in which the value of all the materials used does not exceed **50%** of the ex-works price of the product

rule_sets.heading: Chapter 14
rule_sets.subdivision: Vegetable plaiting materials; vegetable products not elsewhere specified or included

rules.rule: Manufacture in which all the materials of [chapter 14](/chapters/14) used are wholly obtained

rule_sets.subdivision: – Fats from bones or waste

rules.rule: Manufacture from materials of any heading, except those of [heading 0203](/headings/0203), [heading 0206](/headings/0206)  or [heading 0207](/headings/0207)  or bones of [heading 0506](/headings/0506)

rule_sets.subdivision: – Other

rules.rule: Manufacture from meat or edible offal of swine of [heading 0203](/headings/0203) or [heading 0206](/headings/0206)  or of meat and edible offal of poultry of [heading 0207](/headings/0207)

rule_sets.subdivision: – Fats from bones or waste

rules.rule: Manufacture from materials of any heading, except those of [heading 0201](/headings/0201), [heading 0202](/headings/0202) , 0204 or [heading 0206](/headings/0206)  or bones of [heading 0506](/headings/0506)

rule_sets.subdivision: – Other

rules.rule: Manufacture in which all the materials of [chapter 2](/chapters/02) used are wholly obtained

rule_sets.heading: ex Chapter 15
rule_sets.subdivision: Animal or vegetable fats and oils and their cleavage products; prepared edible fats; animal or vegetable waxes

rules.rule: Manufacture from materials of any heading, except that of the product

rule_sets.subdivision: – Solid fractions

rules.rule: Manufacture from materials of any heading, including other materials of [heading 1504](/headings/1504)

rule_sets.subdivision: – Other

rules.rule: Manufacture in which all the materials of [chapter 2](/chapters/02) and [chapter 3](/chapters/03)  used are wholly obtained

rule_sets.heading: ex 1505
rule_sets.subdivision: Refined lanolin

rules.rule: Manufacture from crude wool grease of [heading 1505](/headings/1505)

rule_sets.subdivision: – Solid fractions

rules.rule: Manufacture from materials of any heading, including other materials of [heading 1506](/headings/1506)

rule_sets.subdivision: – Other

rules.rule: Manufacture in which all the materials of [chapter 2](/chapters/02) used are wholly obtained

rule_sets.subdivision: – Soya, ground nut, palm, copra, palm kernel, babassu, tung and oiticica oil, myrtle wax and Japan wax, fractions of jojoba oil and oils for technical or industrial uses other than the manufacture of foodstuffs for human consumption

rules.rule: Manufacture from materials of any heading, except that of the product

rule_sets.subdivision: – Solid fractions, that of jojoba oil

rules.rule: Manufacture from other materials of headings 1507 to 1515

rule_sets.subdivision: – Other

rules.rule: Manufacture in which all the vegetable materials used are wholly obtained

rule_sets.subdivision: Animal or vegetable fats and oils and their fractions, partly or wholly hydrogenated, inter-esterified, re-esterified or elaidinised, whether or not refined, but not further prepared

rules.rule:
Manufacture in which: 

- all the materials of [chapter 2](/chapters/02) used are wholly obtained, *and* 

- all the vegetable materials used are wholly obtained. However, materials of headings 1507, 1508, 1511 and 1513 may be used
class: WO AND (WO TOLERANCE MAY BE USED)

rule_sets.subdivision: Margarine; edible mixtures or preparations of animal or vegetable fats or oils or of fractions of different fats or oils of this Chapter, other than edible fats or oils or their fractions of heading 1516

rules.rule:
Manufacture in which: 

- all the materials of [chapter 2](/chapters/02) and [chapter 4](/chapters/04)  used are wholly obtained, *and* 

- all the vegetable materials used are wholly obtained. However, materials of headings 1507, 1508, 1511 and 1513 may be used
class: WO AND (WO TOLERANCE MAY BE USED)

rule_sets.heading: Chapter 16
rule_sets.subdivision: Preparations of meat, of fish or of crustaceans, molluscs or other aquatic invertebrates

rules.rule:
Manufacture: 

- from animals of [chapter 1](/chapters/01), and/or 

- in which all the materials of [chapter 3](/chapters/03) used are wholly obtained

rule_sets.heading: Chapter 16
rule_sets.subdivision: Preparations of meat, of fish or of crustaceans, molluscs or other aquatic invertebrates

rules.rule:
Manufacture: 

- from animals of [chapter 1](/chapters/01), and/or 

- in which all the materials of [chapter 3](/chapters/03) used are wholly obtained

rule_sets.heading: ex Chapter 17
rule_sets.subdivision: Sugars and sugar confectionery

rules.rule: Manufacture from materials of any heading, except that of the product

rule_sets.heading: ex Chapter 17
rule_sets.subdivision: Sugars and sugar confectionery

rules.rule: Manufacture from materials of any heading, except that of the product

rule_sets.heading: ex 1701
rule_sets.subdivision: Cane or beet sugar and chemically pure sucrose, in solid form, containing added flavouring or colouring matter

rules.rule: Manufacture in which the value of all the materials of [chapter 17](/chapters/17) used does not exceed **30%** of the ex-works price of the product

rule_sets.subdivision: – Chemically-pure maltose and fructose

rules.rule: Manufacture from materials of any heading, including other materials of [heading 1702](/headings/1702)

rule_sets.subdivision: – Other sugars in solid form, containing added flavouring or colouring matter

rules.rule: Manufacture in which the value of all the materials of [chapter 17](/chapters/17) used does not exceed **30%** of the ex-works price of the product

rule_sets.subdivision: – Other

rules.rule: Manufacture in which all the materials used are originating

rule_sets.heading: ex 1703
rule_sets.subdivision: Molasses resulting from the extraction or refining of sugar, containing added flavouring or colouring matter

rules.rule: Manufacture in which the value of all the materials of [chapter 17](/chapters/17) used does not exceed **30%** of the ex-works price of the product

rule_sets.subdivision: Sugar confectionery (including white chocolate), not containing cocoa

rules.rule:
Manufacture: 

- from materials of any heading, except that of the product, *and* 

- in which the value of all the materials of [chapter 17](/chapters/17) used does not exceed **30%** of the ex-works price of the product
